messages.locale/title.offline:
Feeling Lost?
Ask in the Discord for help
messages.locale/title.ready: You are about to be prompted to allow a web request.
messages.locale/title.responding: A Mentor Is On The Way
messages.locale/description.ready: A web request is needed to create a ticket, please accept the prompt that appears when you click Create Ticket.
messages.locale/description.requested: Mentors are volunteers, you may be contacted later if the ticket doesn't get answered at this time.{2}{3}{4}
messages.locale/description.responding: <color=#88ff88><noparse={1}>{0}</color> has claimed the ticket, soon they should either join the world, or contact you through the Contacts list.{2}{3}{4}
messages.locale/description.canceled: If you still need help, please reach out to the Discord or in public worlds. You may be contacted later to see if you still need assistance.
messages.locale/description.completed: Feel free to create another ticket if required, or ask for help on the Discord. The community is often happy to help!
messages.locale/description.2.disconnected:
This panel has lost connection with the mentor service: The panel will attempt to reconnect automatically. Check to ensure the connection is not blocked in Dashboard -> Home -> Debug -> Web Hosts. If all else fails, please cancel and re-create the ticket.
If this problem persists please let us known on the Discord.
messages.locale/description.3.full: The world is currently full: Ask the host to raise the player limit, invite the mentor directly, or coordinate with the mentor to find a work world.
messages.locale/description.4.no access:
The world is not publically accessible: For the mentor to join without an direct invitation the world must be Registered or Anyone, and must not be hidden from the session list.
If you need privacy: Contact the mentor through the Contacts list so they can be invited directly.
messages.locale/requestJustify: This web request is required to create the mentor ticket, please accept the connection request.
